biotools.summary: ML-LPA (Machine Learning-assisted Lipid Phase Analysis) is a Python 3 library developed to analyse lipid membranes generated during molecular dynamics (MD) simulation runs in order to predict the phase of each lipid and map the local environment of the lipids in the bilayer.

bioschemas.name: MLLPA
bioschemas.summary: ML-LPA (Machine Learning-assisted Lipid Phase Analysis) is a Python 3 library developed to analyse lipid membranes generated during molecular dynamics (MD) simulation runs in order to predict the phase of each lipid and map the local environment of the lipids in the bilayer.
